messages.message: Does it look right that there are some standalone webapp pods not under the webapp deployment? If I try looking at those pods’ container logs, google cloud completely glitches out too (just an infinite redirect loop)
this might be quarantined pods for investigating the 504 errors with flask + grpc + file-service v2.

Gotcha. Is it possible nginx is trying to route about 1/3 of the traffic to these 2/6 pods? Sounds like there’s something going on here that you have a separate fix for. Just noticed the similarity in the proportion of hanging requests.
hrm, no there shouldn’t be traffic going to these pods if they’re quarantined

likely what you’re seeing is the long updates from Xi on the webapp or api server pods getting deadlocked and unusable. So with 1/4 borked pods, all the traffic that gets routed there will end up timing out. we need to flip off file service v2 in flask/gevent services to resolve this
